dt-example.js-vanilla:
let table = new DataTable('#example');
new DataTable.Responsive(table);
dt-example.title: `new` constructor
dt-example.info:
Responsive will automatically detect new DataTable instances being created on a page and initialise itself if it finds the `r-init responsive` option as was of the initialisation parameters, as shown in the other examples.
Another way of initialising Responsive is by manually creating a new instance using the `DataTable.Responsive` class, as shown in this example (the other two methods are provided using this constructor in an `dt-event init` event handler!).
